name: The X-Files Game
description: The X-Files Game is an interactive movie point-and-click adventure video game developed by HyperBole Studios and first published by Fox Interactive. The game was released for Microsoft Windows, Mac OS and PlayStation in 1998, and is based on the television series The X-Files. A second, but unrelated game, The X-Files: Resist or Serve, was released for PlayStation 2 in 2004.
